body_content.explanation: a complete way of learning something that means you fully understand it and will not forget it:
examples: Deep learning is the kind you take with you through the rest of your life.

body_content.explanation: a type of machine learning (= the process of computers improving their own ability to perform tasks by analysing new data) that uses many layers of data processing:
examples: Deep learning has been responsible for the most exciting developments in data science in recent years.
Face identification tasks can now be solved by deep learning.
